# startFrame

**Instance Property**

The size and location of the overlay before the transition.

## Declaration

```swift
var startFrame: CGRect { get }
```

## Adding an Animation

- **addAnimation(_:)**: Adds a closure you can use to animate view properties.
- **endFrame**: The size and location of the overlay at the end of the transition.
